author: tersec
content: is https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/4882aa0803b622b75bab286b285599d70b7a2429/apis/eventstream/index.yaml#L138-L142 for the `blob_sidecar` streaming still using the https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/v1.4.0-beta.3/specs/deneb/p2p-interface.md#blobsidecar `BlobSidecar` schema/type rather than the https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/v1.4.0-beta.5/specs/deneb/p2p-interface.md#blobsidecar `Blobsidecar` type?

author: jgm
content: It isn't using either, from what I remember.  It's whatever useful information people wanted in there.
